cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Bunk beds, shared bathroom facilities on every level, individual bed light, huge luggage locker (own padlock required), air-con, key card security, linen provided. The rate is quoted per bed.
All bookings are subject to the YHA Australia terms/conditions

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Room with double bed and single bed, shared bathroom, air conditioning, bed linen and towels provided.
All bookings are subject to the YHA Australia terms/conditions. Guests must provide a valid passport, interstate license, or regional/rural SA license.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (ACDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 17th Oct 2025 (ACDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
